name: thready
content:
thready adjective
(LIKE THREADS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
like or consisting of thin threads: The caramel has a thready texture at this stage of the process. The baby was tottering about on her thready legs.
More examplesFewer examplesThe pieces of meat looked rather thready.He had a thready little ginger beard.The walls were covered with thin cracks and patterns of thready lines.

thready adjective
(WEAK)
If a person's heartbeat (= the regular sound that the heart makes) is thready, it is so weak that it is hard to hear it: I could just make out the thready beat of his failing heart. Her pulse was thready and intermittent.
A thready voice has no strength or power: Charles replied in a thready voice. He sang in a thready tenor.
